Posts.EditableText: Every time I try to publish my game, it gives me an error saying something went wrong. I've tried to publish it over multiple days, but I still haven't had any luck. Anyone know how to fix this?
Posts.HTML: Every time I try to publish my game, it gives me an error saying something went wrong. I've tried to publish it over multiple days, but I still haven't had any luck. Anyone know how to fix this?

Posts.EditableText: What error message do you get?  Does your game have a lot of images and/or sounds?
Posts.HTML: What error message do you get? Does your game have a lot of images and/or sounds?

Posts.EditableText:
Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things.

No sounds. I have one image; I'll try deleting it.
Posts.HTML:
Sorry, something went wrong
An error occurred while processing your request.

This has been logged, but it would be really helpful if you could let us know a bit more information about what you were doing - please contact us and we'll do our best to fix things.

No sounds. I have one image; I'll try deleting it.

Posts.EditableText: I deleted the image and the publish worked. Thanks for your help!
Posts.HTML: I deleted the image and the publish worked. Thanks for your help!

Posts.EditableText:
Now try to publish it with the picture in the same folder as your code...
I think I had an issue like that when I first published Wumpus.
